overview: Bad Haggis is described as "cutting edge Celtic meets groin' jazzy-world fusion."  Band Members:  Eric Rigler - pipes, whistles & vocals Kathleen Keane - fiddle, whistles & vocals Mike Hoffman - guitars Mick Linden vocals & electric bass Alberto lopez - percussion & vocals Byron Holley - drums & vocals  Special Guests:  Ruben Blades - precision & vocals Los Angeles Scots Pipe Band  Set List:  Mysterious Integration The Hag at the Churn When She Drives Templo de Agua La Gallega Walking the Plank The B-52 Rip Hop Barcos Monkey Tree Bad Haggis
title: Bad Haggis with Ruben Blades
